data.title: Get your CashBack 20% of your holiday!
data.description: The island of Samosir, situated in the huge crater lake of Toba. The island, together with its surrounding areas is the heart of the Toba Batak culture. A visit to Lake Toba is not complete without a stay on Samosir with its many traditional villages along its shoreline.
